vaex.io package¶

Submodules¶

vaex.io.colfits module¶

vaex.io.gadget module¶

vaex.io.gadget.getinfo(filename, seek=None)[source]¶

Read header data from Gadget data file ‘filename’ with Gadget file type ‘gtype’. Returns a dictionary with loaded values and filename.
